name: SenecaQuotes
0:
”Alexa, ask seneca quotes to say a quote.”
”Give me a seneca quote.”
”Tell me a Letters from a Stoic quote.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: seneca quotes
des: This skill tells users a random quote from the popular Stoic book 'Letters from a Stoic'. 'Letters from a Stoic' is a collection of letters written by Seneca, a Roman Stoic philosopher. In his letters, Seneca shares timeless life lessons with his friend Lucilius.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
